slider_one_title: Quick SOS Alerts at Your Fingertips
slider_one_body: Send emergency alerts instantly to your trusted contacts with just a tap or voice command.
slider_two_body: Share your live location even without an internet connection to help rescuers find you faster.
slider_three_body: Access life-saving features in the language you're comfortable with.
form_instruction: Enter your Username, Matric number and the language of your choice to continue
